column1: Identify the sign of the charge stored on capacitors in series and parallel attached to a battery.
Recognize capacitors as connected in series and parallel.
Determine the voltage difference and/or charge across capacitors within capacitor circuits with both series and parallel connections.
Characterize the discharging of a capacitor in an RC circuit in time, including the calculation of time constant.
Characterize the charging of a capacitor in an RC circuit in time, including the calculation of time constant.
Utilize charge current and voltage difference time plots to determine circuit time constants and capacitor and/or resistor characteristics.
Utilize charging and discharging capacitors in circuits to determine circuit time constants and capacitor and/or resistor characteristics.
Apply concepts of electric fields, potential, resistance, capacitance and circuits to describe the nature of electrical signals in the nervous system.
